home.welcomeSubtitle: Ushering in the era of AI Native
home.welcomeDesc: Open source, practical AI programmer, your main task changes from writing code to asking questions and viewing code

case1.title: AI Agent: Understands your thoughts, answers every question
case1.desc: Describe in natural language, autonomously create code files, generate code directly in the workspace, and automatically complete tests.

case2.title: Code Completion: A stroke of genius, code continues instantly
case2.desc: Automatic code completion provides accurate contextual completion for more precision, generating code in seconds.

case3.title: Enterprise-level Private Deployment:
case3.desc: Supports enterprise-level private deployment, designed for security and privacy.

ideSupport.title: Supports multiple IDEs and languages, continuously increasing...
ideSupport.desc: Supports multiple mainstream IDEs, with Visual Studio Code being the first to be supported (InteliJ IDEA and PyCharm will soon be supported). Supports multiple mainstream languages such as Python, Go, C++/C, JavaScript, Java, etc.

openSource.title: Open Source and Free
openSource.desc: Welcome to join us and make AI more efficient!

download.title: SHENMA
download.desc: Shenma is an open source and practical AI programmer that implements functions such as code completion, intelligent Q&A, code review, code optimization, single test writing, and comment generation based on the open source big model.
download.vscodeTitle: Install Shenma Code in Visual Studio Code, requiring the latest version or version 1.84.0 or above
download.installSteps: The installation steps are as follows:
